name: jabterm
description: JabTerm - Just Another Browser Terminal. Drop-in React component + Node.js server.

scripts.test:integration: node -e "console.log('No integration tests in this repo. (intentional)')"
scripts.test:docs: pnpm run build && test-runner e2e --project docs
scripts.test:server:coverage: rm -rf .cache/v8-coverage && pnpm run build && NODE_V8_COVERAGE=.cache/v8-coverage test-runner scenario && NODE_V8_COVERAGE=.cache/v8-coverage test-runner e2e
scripts.coverage:server:report: rm -rf .cache/coverage/server && pnpm exec c8 report --temp-directory .cache/v8-coverage --reporter=text-summary --reporter=json-summary --report-dir .cache/coverage/server --all --src src/server --exclude "**/playwright.config.ts" --exclude "tests/**" --exclude "src/react/**" && node scripts/normalize-coverage-summary.mjs .cache/coverage/server/coverage-summary.json
scripts.coverage:ci: pnpm test:server:coverage && pnpm coverage:server:report && pnpm test:client:coverage && node scripts/normalize-coverage-summary.mjs .cache/coverage/client/coverage-summary.json && pnpm coverage:merge && pnpm coverage:badge
